name: Coffee House Rumble!
description:
It started like any other day at Fish Lady Coffee...

Karen: Hi can i get a hot coffeechino?

Barista: I'm so sorry ma'am, unfortunately we cannot make our coffeechinos hot, but we can make you a latte with the same flavor.

Karen: They did it for me last time.

Barista: We do not have a recipe for that since it is not a real drink, they most likely made you the latte.

Karen: Are you giving me attitude right now? I AM A PAYING CUSTOMER!

Barista: Ma'am I...

Karen: LET ME SPEAK TO THE MANAGER NOW!! 

Barista: (under his breath) I really don't get paid enough for this...

Service industry workers put up with a lot and are not often treated fairly. Step into the shoes of a Karen or a barista and see what it's like to be beaten up or beat on an underpaid and underappreciated employee in Coffee House Rumble!

Features include:

-1 player or 2 players

-6 Karen attacks

-2 barista attacks

-Subtitles

-Characters react if they win, loose, or tie

-Smooth Jazzy Vibes (courtesy of OpenGameArt.org)

Single player vs multi player:

-If two people are playing, one should play as karen and the other as the barista.

-If one person is playing, use your left hand to control karen and right hand to control the barista. After playing one-person mode players are encourged to reflect on which character one and why they allowed that character to do so.

Karen:

-WASD to move (moves faster then barista)

-Low damage attacks (5pts, .2 sec cooldown) E (blame barista) or Q (Live Laugh Love) 

-Med damage attacks (10pts, .5 sec cooldown) F (purse throttle) or C (hot coffee)

-High damage attacks (20 pts, 1 sec cooldown) Z (hot headed) or X (call manager)

Barista:

-Arrow keys to move (moves slower then Karen)

-H to remake drinks (5 points, 1 sec cooldown)

-J to ask for tip (5 points, .5 sec cooldown)

Known Bugs/Unexpected "Features":

-Spamming keys sometimes prevents attack poses or subtitles from showing.

-Players can go slightly of bounds on right wall and bottom of screen. Just pretend the characters are hiding to avoid (barista) or ambush (Karen).

Notes for Version 2:

-Barista attack input changed

-Time reduced to 30 secs
